name: Peanut Butter Jelly Vortex
description:
Made for the  20 Second Game Jam.

The Peanut Butter and Jelly Dimension leaks into the Realm of Xeemox.  You have 20 seconds to maneuver your slices of bread into the vortex beams to make sandwiches for him. Beware! Flies are emigrating from the PBJD -  and they don't taste good on sandwiches.

Controls:

Up Arrow/ Down Arrow - Move Right Slice

A/Z - Move Left Slice

X or Left Arrow - When both slices are in the center, feed Xeemox. 

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
